title: Green Chile Vinaigrette
ingredients: - 2 poblano chiles, roasted, peeled, seeded and chopped
- Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Combine the poblanos, garlic, vinegar, lime juice, ¼ cup of water, and honey in a blender, season with salt and pepper, and blend until smooth. With the motor running, slowly add the oil and blend until emulsified. Add the cilantro and blend for 5 seconds more. There should be flecks of the cilantro in the vinaigrette. This can be made up to 8 hours in advance and refrigerated.
